TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IScheduler implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Defines the methods used to schedule and manage the jobs and tasks in a compute cluster.

Docs.summary: Adds the specified job to the scheduler.

Public Sub CancelJob (jobId As Integer, message As String)
abstract member CancelJob : int * string -> unit

Docs.summary: Cancels the specified job and provides a message to the user that explains why you canceled the job.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CancelJob (int jobId, string message, bool isForced);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CancelJob(int32 jobId, string message, bool isForced) cil managed
Public Sub CancelJob (jobId As Integer, message As String, isForced As Boolean)
abstract member CancelJob : int * string * bool -> unit

Docs.summary: Cancels the specified job and provides a message to the user that explains why you canceled the job, and optionally forces the job to stop immediately. When you force the job to stop immediately, this method ignores the grace period for canceling the tasks in the job, and does not run the node release task for the job.
